meanings.definition: The action or process of adapting or being adapted.
meanings.sent1: The adaptations of animals to their environment help them survive.
meanings.sent2: She studied the adaptations of plants in different climates.
meanings.sent3: The adaptations of the penguin to the hot desert made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: His adaptations to the new school were like a chameleon blending into its surroundings.
meanings.sent5: The adaptations of the superhero's suit were so advanced that they seemed almost magical.

meanings.definition: A change or adjustment to fit a new purpose or situation.
meanings.sent1: The adaptations in the recipe made it taste even better.
meanings.sent2: The car mechanic suggested some adaptations to improve the vehicle's performance.
meanings.sent3: The adaptations to the robot's dance moves were unexpected but entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her adaptations to the role of a leader were like a caterpillar transforming into a butterfly.
meanings.sent5: The adaptations to the old building turned it into a modern art gallery.
